resources.string: Tokens that can be traded and transferred at anytime. \nWebblen can be converted to Web Power in a process called powering up.
Influence tokens which give you more control over event payouts and allow you to earn more on attendance rewards.
Tokens worth about $1.00 of WBLN, currently collecting 0% APR.
Balance subject to 3 day withdraw waiting period, Web Dollars currently collecting 0% APR.
The value is based on an average value of WBLN in US dollars.
